body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/dvmdb/adom/{{adom}}/script",
            "data": [
                {
                    "script_schedule": null,
                    "name": "Cleanup",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "desc": "",
                    "content": "# Cleanup BGP and SD-WAN Configuration
config system sdwan
  unset status
  config service
    purge
  end
  config health-check
    purge
  end    
  config members
    purge
  end
  config zone
    purge
  end
end
config router bgp
  unset as 
  unset router-id 
  unset keepalive-timer 
  unset holdtime-timer 
  unset ibgp-multipath 
  unset network-import-check 
  unset additional-path 
  unset scan-time 
  config neighbor-range
    purge
  end
  config neighbor-group
    purge
  end
  config neighbor
    purge
  end
  config network
    purge
  end
  config vrf-leak
    purge
  end
end
config router policy
  purge
end
config router route-map
   purge
end
config router prefix-list
   purge
end
",
                    "target": "device_database"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Overlay",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Hub
                    
# Configure tunnel interface IPs
config system interface
  edit \"OL_INET_0\"
    set ip 10.200.1$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.1$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_0\"
    set ip 10.200.2$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.2$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"OL_INET_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 1$(dc-id)
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 2$(dc-id)    
  next
end

                    "
                },
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-Overlay",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Branch
                    
# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"OL_INET_11\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 11
  next
  edit \"OL_INET_12\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 12
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_21\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 21
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_22\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 22
  next
end


# Allow shortcut monitoring (ping)
config system interface
  edit \"OL_INET_11\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"OL_INET_12\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_21\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_22\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end
                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-Routing-BGP",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Spoke
                    
# BGP to Hub
config router bgp
  set as 65000
  set router-id 10.0.$(branch-id).1
  set keepalive-timer 5
  set holdtime-timer 15
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set additional-path enable
  set scan-time 20
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.11.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"OL_INET_11\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.12.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"OL_INET_12\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.21.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"OL_MPLS_21\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.22.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"OL_MPLS_22\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.0.$(branch-id).0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
  "session": "{{session}}",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "set",
  "params": [
    {
      "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
      "data": [
        {
          "name": "Hub-Routing-BGP",
          "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Hub
                    
# Avoid cross-overlay advertisements
config router prefix-list
  edit \"NH_INET\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 10.200.1$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
        set le 32
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"NH_MPLS\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 10.200.2$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
        set le 32
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"NH_LOCAL\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255
      next
    end
  next
end
config router route-map
  edit \"INET_OUT\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set match-ip-nexthop \"NH_INET\"
      next
      edit 2
        set match-ip-nexthop \"NH_LOCAL\"
      next
      edit 100
        set action deny
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"MPLS_OUT\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set match-ip-nexthop \"NH_MPLS\"
      next
      edit 2
        set match-ip-nexthop \"NH_LOCAL\"
      next
      edit 100
        set action deny
      next
    end
  next
end

# Configure BGP neighbors
config router bgp
  set as 65000
  set router-id 10.$(dc-id).0.1
  set keepalive-timer 5
  set holdtime-timer 15
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set additional-path enable
  set scan-time 20
  config neighbor-group
    edit \"OL_INET\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"OL_INET_0\"
      set route-map-out \"INET_OUT\"
      set additional-path send
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
    edit \"OL_MPLS\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"OL_MPLS_0\"
      set route-map-out \"MPLS_OUT\"
      set additional-path send
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.200.1$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"OL_INET\"
    next
    edit 2
      set prefix 10.200.2$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"OL_MPLS\"
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

# Overlay stickiness
config router policy
  edit 1
    set input-device \"OL_INET_0\"
    set output-device \"OL_INET_0\"
  next
  edit 2
    set input-device \"OL_MPLS_0\"
    set output-device \"OL_MPLS_0\"
  next
end

                    "
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/pkg/DataCenter-PP/firewall/policy/",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Branch to Branch",
                    "policyid": 1,
                    "srcintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "dstintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "anti-replay": 0,
                    "tcp-session-without-syn": 0,
                    "profile-protocol-options": [],
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Health-Check",
                    "policyid": 2,
                    "srcintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "dstintf": "any",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "HC",
                    "service": "PING",
                    "action": 1,
                    "profile-protocol-options": [],
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 3
                },
                {
                    "name": "Branch to DC",
                    "policyid": 3,
                    "srcintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "dstintf": "vl_lan",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "profile-protocol-options": [],
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Branch to Internet (RIA)",
                    "policyid": 4,
                    "srcintf": "OL_MPLS",
                    "dstintf": "port1",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "nat": 1,
                    "utm-status": 1,
                    "application-list": [
                        "default"
                    ],
                    "ssl-ssh-profile": [
                        "deep-inspection"
                    ],
                    "profile-protocol-options": [],
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

item.name: 8 - Add CLI Template - Spoke Routing RIA

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-Routing-RIA",
                    "script": "# Support Remote Internet Access
                    
config router static
   edit 21
      set priority 10
      set device \"OL_MPLS_21\"
   next
   edit 22
      set priority 10
      set device \"OL_MPLS_22\"
   next
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

request.description: This interim policy install is a MUST when you run this collection in bulk (using Runner). That's because dynamic interfaces created later depend on the existence of some interfaces created before...

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Routing-InterDC",
                    "script": "# DC-to-DC Connectivity
                    
# Configure hub-to-hub tunnel IPs
config system interface
  edit \"OL_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set ip 10.200.10.$(dc-id) 255.255.255.255
      set remote-ip 10.200.10.$(remote-dc-id) 255.255.255.252
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set ip 10.200.20.$(dc-id) 255.255.255.255
      set remote-ip 10.200.20.$(remote-dc-id) 255.255.255.252
  next
end

# Configure prefix-list and route-map for local DC LAN
config router prefix-list
  edit \"LAN_DC$(dc-id)\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
        unset ge
        unset le
      next
    end
  next
end
config router route-map
  edit \"DC2DC_OUT\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set match-ip-address \"LAN_DC$(dc-id)\"
      next
      edit 2
        set action deny
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"DC2DC_INET_IN\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set set-local-preference 200
      next
    end
  next
end

# Configure hub-to-hub BGP peering
config router bgp
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.10.$(remote-dc-id)\"
        set advertisement-interval 1
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set remote-as 65000
        set interface \"OL_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set route-map-in \"DC2DC_INET_IN\"
        set route-map-out \"DC2DC_OUT\"
    next
    edit \"10.200.20.$(remote-dc-id)\"
        set advertisement-interval 1
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set remote-as 65000
        set interface \"OL_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set route-map-out \"DC2DC_OUT\"
    next
  end
end

                    "
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

body.raw:
{
  "session": "{{session}}",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "set",
  "params": [
    {
      "url": "/dvmdb/adom/{{adom}}/script",
      "data": [
        {
          "script_schedule": null,
          "name": "Configure ZTP Interfaces",
          "type": "cli",
          "desc": "",
          "content": "# Interfaces for ZTP device
config system interface
  edit port4
    set ip 172.16.0.11 255.255.255.248
    set mode static
    set type physical
    set allowaccess ping
    set vdom root
  next
  edit port5
    set type physical
    set vdom root
  next
  edit port10
    set ip 192.168.0.14 255.255.255.0
    set type physical
    set allowaccess ping http https fgfm ssh
    set vdom root
  next
  edit vl_lan
    set vdom root
    set ip 10.0.3.1 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping ssh
    set color 3
    set interface port5
    set vlanid 1000
  next  
end
config router static                                                                  
  edit 1
    set dst 172.16.0.0 255.255.0.0
    set gateway 172.16.0.9
    set device port4
  next                                                                                
  edit 2
    set gateway 203.0.113.1                                                 
    set device port1                                                               
  next                                                                            
end
config system global
  set hostname \"{{name_fgt_ztp}}\"
  set gui-device-latitude \"40.418852\"
  set gui-device-longitude \"-3.693454\"
end",
                    "target": "device_database"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Overlay-TS",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Hub
                    
# Configure tunnel interface IPs
config system interface
  edit \"TS_INET_0\"
    set ip 10.200.11$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.11$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_0\"
    set ip 10.200.12$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.12$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"TS_INET_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 11$(dc-id)
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 12$(dc-id)
  next
end

                    "
                },
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-Overlay-TS",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Branch
                    
# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"TS_INET_111\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 111
  next
  edit \"TS_INET_112\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 112
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_121\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 121
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_122\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 122
  next
end

# Allow shortcut monitoring (ping)
config system interface
  edit \"TS_INET_111\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"TS_INET_112\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_121\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_122\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

                    "
                }

        }
    ]

item.name: 1 - Add CLI Template - Spoke Routing TS

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-Routing-TS",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Spoke
                    
# Configure VRFs
config system interface
  edit \"TS_INET_111\"
    set vrf 10
  next
  edit \"TS_INET_112\"
    set vrf 10
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_121\"
    set vrf 10
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_122\"
    set vrf 10
  next
end

# BGP to Hub
config router bgp
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.111.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"TS_INET_111\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.112.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"TS_INET_112\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.121.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"TS_MPLS_121\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.122.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"TS_MPLS_122\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 101
      set prefix 10.0.10$(branch-id).0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

item.name: 2 - Add CLI Template - Hub Routing TS

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Routing-TS",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Hub
                    
# Configure VRFs
config system interface
  edit \"TS_INET_0\"
    set vrf 10
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_0\"
    set vrf 10
  next
end

# Add new BGP NH subnets
config router prefix-list
  edit \"NH_INET\"
    config rule
      edit 2
        set prefix 10.200.11$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
        set le 32
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"NH_MPLS\"
    config rule
      edit 2
        set prefix 10.200.12$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
        set le 32
      next
    end
  next
end

# Configure BGP TS neighbors
config router bgp
  config neighbor-group
    edit \"TS_INET\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"TS_INET_0\"
      set update-source \"TS_INET_0\"
      set route-map-out \"INET_OUT\"
      set additional-path send
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
    edit \"TS_MPLS\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"TS_MPLS_0\"
      set update-source \"TS_MPLS_0\"
      set route-map-out \"MPLS_OUT\"
      set additional-path send
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    edit 11
      set prefix 10.200.11$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"TS_INET\"
    next
    edit 12
      set prefix 10.200.12$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"TS_MPLS\"
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

# Overlay stickiness
config router policy
  edit 11
    set input-device \"TS_INET_0\"
    set output-device \"TS_INET_0\"
  next
  edit 12
    set input-device \"TS_MPLS_0\"
    set output-device \"TS_MPLS_0\"
  next
end

                    "
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

item.name: 2 - Add FGTs to Regional VPN Communities

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/vpnmgr/node",
            "data": [
                {
                    "protected_subnet": {
                        "addr": "all",
                        "seq": 1
                    },
                    "scope member": {
                        "name": "{{name_fgt_dc}}",
                        "vdom": "root"
                    },
                    "vpntable": "R1_INET",
                    "role": 0,
                    "iface": "port1",
                    "hub_iface": [],
                    "peer": [],
                    "automatic_routing": 0,
                    "mode-cfg": 1,
                    "mode-cfg-ip-version": 0,
                    "ipv4-start-ip": "10.200.11.1",
                    "ipv4-end-ip": "10.200.11.9",
                    "ipv4-netmask": "255.255.255.0",
                    "net-device": 0,
                    "tunnel-search": 1,
                    "extgwip": [],
                    "extgw_hubip": [],
                    "extgw_p2_per_net": 0,
                    "route-overlap": 0,
                    "vpn-zone": [],
                    "spoke-zone": [],
                    "vpn-interface-priority": 0,
                    "auto-configuration": 1,
                    "dns-service": 5,
                    "dhcp-server": 1,
                    "ipsec-lease-hold": 60,
                    "add-route": 0,
                    "assign-ip": 1,
                    "assign-ip-from": 0,
                    "authusrgrp": [],
                    "dns-mode": 1,
                    "exchange-interface-ip": 0,
                    "peergrp": [],
                    "peertype": 1,
                    "unity-support": 1,
                    "xauthtype": 1
                },
                {
                    "protected_subnet": {
                        "addr": "all",
                        "seq": 1

item.name: 4 - Add Hubs to Inter-Region VPN Community

exec: pm.expect(0).to.equal(1, "Timeout while waiting for task completion");

request.description: This interim policy install is a MUST when you run this collection in bulk (using Runner). That's because dynamic interfaces created later depend on the existence of some interfaces created before...

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-DualRegion-Overlay",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Hub
                    
# Configure tunnel interface IPs
config system interface
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
    set ip 10.200.1$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.1$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set ip 10.200.2$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.2$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set ip 10.200.10.$(dc-id) 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.10.$(remote-dc-id) 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set ip 10.200.20.$(dc-id) 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.20.$(remote-dc-id) 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
  next
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
  next
  edit \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set auto-discovery-forwarder enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
  next
  edit \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set auto-discovery-forwarder enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
  next
end

                    "
                },
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-DualRegion-Overlay",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Branch
                    
# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"R$(branch-id)_INET_0\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
  next
  edit \"R$(branch-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
  next
end

# Allow shortcut monitoring (ping)
config system interface
  edit \"R$(branch-id)_INET_0\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"R$(branch-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-DualRegion-Routing",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Spoke
                    
## BGP to Hub
config router bgp
  set as 65000
  set router-id 10.0.$(branch-id).1
  set keepalive-timer 5
  set holdtime-timer 15
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set additional-path enable
  set scan-time 20
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.1$(branch-id).10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"R$(branch-id)_INET_0\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.2$(branch-id).10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"R$(branch-id)_MPLS_0\"
        set connect-timer 1
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.0.$(branch-id).0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

# Configure remote region's overlay reachability
config router static
  edit 10
    set dst 10.200.0.0 255.255.240.0
    set device \"R$(branch-id)_INET_0\"
  next
  edit 20
    set dst 10.200.16.0 255.255.240.0
    set device \"R$(branch-id)_MPLS_0\"
  next
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
  "session": "{{session}}",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "set",
  "params": [
    {
      "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
      "data": [
        {
          "name": "Hub-DualRegion-Routing",
          "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Hub
                    
# Avoid cross-overlay advertisements
config router prefix-list
  edit \"NH_INET\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 10.200.0.0 255.255.240.0
        set le 32
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"NH_MPLS\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 10.200.16.0 255.255.240.0
        set le 32
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"NH_LOCAL\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255
      next
    end
  next
end
config router route-map
	edit \"INET_OUT\"
		config rule
			edit 1
        set match-ip-nexthop \"NH_INET\"
			next
      edit 2
				set match-ip-nexthop \"NH_LOCAL\"
      next
			edit 100
        set action deny
			next
		end
	next
  edit \"MPLS_OUT\"
		config rule
			edit 1
				set match-ip-nexthop \"NH_MPLS\"
			next
      edit 2
				set match-ip-nexthop \"NH_LOCAL\"
      next
			edit 100
        set action deny
			next
		end
	next
end

# Configure BGP neighbors
config router bgp
  set as 65000
  set router-id 10.$(dc-id).0.1
  set keepalive-timer 5
  set holdtime-timer 15
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set additional-path enable
  set scan-time 20
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.10.$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set route-map-out \"INET_OUT\"
      set connect-timer 1
      set additional-path both
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
    edit \"10.200.20.$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set route-map-out \"MPLS_OUT\"
      set connect-timer 1
      set additional-path both
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
  end
  config neighbor-group
    edit \"R$(dc-id)_INET\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
      set route-map-out \"INET_OUT\"
      set connect-timer 1
      set additional-path send
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
    edit \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
      set route-map-out \"MPLS_OUT\"
      set connect-timer 1
      set additional-path send
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.200.1$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"R$(dc-id)_INET\"
    next
    edit 2
      set prefix 10.200.2$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS\"
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

# Configure remote region's overlay reachability
config router static
  edit 10
    set dst 10.200.0.0 255.255.240.0
    set device \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
  next
  edit 20
    set dst 10.200.16.0 255.255.240.0
    set device \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
  next
end

# Overlay stickiness
config router policy
  edit 1
    set input-device \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
    set output-device \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
  next
  edit 2
    set input-device \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set output-device \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
  next
  edit 11
    set input-device \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
    set output-device \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
  next
  edit 12
    set input-device \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set output-device \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
  next
  edit 21
    set input-device \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set output-device \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
  next
  edit 22
    set input-device \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set output-device \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
  next
end

                    "
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

pm.test("HTTP Status code is 200 OK", function () {
